tool_description:
With this API you can search and explore Mashape's Marketplace.
Now every devices (Android,iPhone ecc) can access to Mashape  for a quick search.
name: Mashape
title: Mashape

api_list.name: Find for Tags
api_list.description: This route find API for Tags like Tools,Education,Device .... You need to replace "parameter" value with your tags.

api_list.name: Explore
api_list.description: This route get JSON array of Mashape's explore page.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rokity-mashape-v1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rokity-mashape-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://rokity-mashape-v1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rokity-mashape-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Find for Name
api_list.description: Find your Api. You need to replace "parameter" value with the API's name.
